pages.text: The $(thing)Auto-Quern$() is a machine used to automatically grind items into powders and dyes.
The $(thing)Steel Grindstone$() is the tool used within the $(thing)Auto-Quern$(). Made on the anvil.
The $(thing)Extruding Machine$() is a machine used to automatically form metal rods and wires. Requires metal that is hot enough to work.
The $(thing)Steel Machine Die$() is the tool used within the $(thing)Extruding Machine$(). Made on the anvil.
The $(thing)Rolling Machine$() is a machine used to automatically form metal sheets. Requires metal that is hot enough to work.
The $(thing)Steel Rollers$() are tools used within the $(thing)Rolling Machine$(). Made on the anvil.
